100543.「古き踊り子の チカラの根源。\n 軽やかでもあり チカラ強くもある……\n 神:
The root of the power of the old dancers. The
mysterious, ancient steps that are both light
and powerful.

100544.「やっぱり来たのね <cs_pchero>。\n 足音を聞いただけでも わかるわ:
I knew you were coming <cs_pchero>. I can
tell just by your footsteps. You've grown up
quite a bit.

100547.「怨霊つきを 引き寄せてしまったようね……。\n やっぱり 復活を邪魔されないよ:
I guess I've attracted a grudge... I knew it... I'm having him attack the dancers with his skill to prevent them from interfering
with his resurrection.

100549.「グゥウウウ……コロ…セ！\n オド…リコ……コロ……セ！:
Guuuuuuu... colo... se! Odo... rico... colo...
se!

100550.「３体か……。\n さすがに 一度で浄化するのは\n 無理があるわね。引きずり出:
Three... as expected, it's impossible to
purify them all at once. If we could just drag
them out...

100552.「<cs_pchero>。悪いけど……チカラを貸して！\n この球の中に 怨霊を:
. I'm sorry... but I need your help! I've got a grudge trapped inside this ball, but...dang it, I can't purify all three
of them at the same time.

100553.「私が踊りをやめれば 封印は解け……\n 逃げた怨霊が また誰かに とりついてし:
If I stop dancing, the seal will be broken and the fleeing ghosts will return to haunt someone else. Before that happens... get
inside and destroy them!

100554.「大丈夫……この縛霊球の中は 存外に広いのよ。\n 舞い踊るのに 不自由は しな:
Don't worry... the inside of this ball is much bigger than you think. It shouldn't be too difficult for you to dance. I can't stay like
this for much longer.

100555.「くうっ……遅いわよっ……！\n さすがの私も……そろそろ……限界っ。\n 今度:
Damn... you're late...! Even I... can't hold
out any longer. This time... defeat me...
please...

100557.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>。どうやら 怨霊を\n 浄化できたようね。あ:
Thanks <cs_pchero>. It looks like you were
able to purge the grudge. Thanks to you, those
persons went home safely.

100558.「……<cs_pchero>。\n ここまで 巻き込んでしまったからには\n あ:
...<cs_pchero>. Now that I've gotten you
this far, I'll tell you all about it.

100559.「書き置きしておいたように……\n 私は 会いにきたの。\n ここに眠っている:
As I left a note I came to see you. I've come
to see the man who once rested here...

100560.「……と言っても 気休めなんだけどね。\n 肉体も霊魂も ここには いないのだか:
But that's just a comforting thought. There is
no body or spirit here...

100561.「もうわかっていると思うけど\n 私は ただの踊り子じゃないわ。\n 歌や踊りの:
As you probably already know, I'm not just a
dancer. I'm someone who uses the power of song
and dance to sweep away grudges...

100562.「怨霊の王たる 黒怨王と戦ってきた\n いにしえの踊り子の一族……。\n その最:
The last survivor of an ancient family of
dancers who have fought against the Hell King.

100563.「私には 果たすべき悲願があってね。\n 一族に封印されては 復活をくり返してき:
I have a long-cherished wish to fulfill. I have a long-cherished wish to completely purify the Hell King, who has been repeatedly
resurrected after being sealed away by my family.

100564.「でも……私は 失敗したの。\n 私は 合方を……アイツを犠牲にして……\n 彼:
But...I failed. I had no choice but to
sacrifice Goho... and him... to seal the Hell
King.

100565.「だから……黒怨王の復活を感じたとき\n 絶対 カタキを討たなきゃ……って思った:
So...when I sensed the Hell King's
resurrection, I knew I had to take down
Kataki...

100566.「ナッチョスは 何も聞かず 協力してくれたわ。 \n 私の合方に ふさわしい素質:
Nachos cooperated with me without asking any
questions. I was to find the right person for
my partner and raise him...

100567.「あなたは それらを 見事にこなし成長した。\n 最初は認めたくなかったけど……:
You've grown into them with flying colors. I didn't want to admit it at first, but your talent is as good as any I've seen in the
past.

100568.「でもね。この前 カイユの葉を渡されたとき\n なんだか 怖くなったのよ……。\:
But you know what? The other day, when you handed me the Recovery Leaf, I got kind of scared... wondering if I really wanted to
involve you in this.

100569.「じつは アイツからも 同じように\n カイユの葉をもらったことが あってね……:
I had received a Recovery Leaf from him once
as well, and I felt like I was repeating the
same mistake.

100570.「だけど その成長ぶりを見て 決心がついたわ。\n 今は あなたのチカラを信じ:
But seeing how you've grown has made me determined. Now is the time to believe in your power and move forward. This is no time to be
afraid.

100571.「だから……どうかお願いよ <cs_pchero>。\n 今度こそ 黒怨王を 完:
So... please, please <cs_pchero>. This time,
to completely purify Hell King. Will you be my
partner?<yesno><close>

100572.「……そう言われても 仕方ないわ。 \n カタキ討ちなんて ひとりでするのがスジ:
I don't blame you if you say so. It's natural for one person to take down a katakana alone, isn't it? But the Hell King can only be
defeated by two.

100573.「そして さっきの戦いで 確信したのよ。 \n こんなに 頼りになる合方は 他に:
And I was convinced after the fight earlier.
There is no one else I can rely on like you.
You are my only hope. So...please.<yesno><close>

100574.「……確かに 私は かつての合方を\n 見殺しにしてしまった。でも……\n あな:
It's true that I left my former partner to
die. But...I will protect you even if it costs
me my life.

100575.「それに このまま 黒怨王を放っておけば\n 無関係の踊り子が 犠牲になってしま:
Besides, if the Hell King is left unchecked,
innocent dancers will be sacrificed. I
cannot allow that to happen. So, please!<yesno><close>

100576.「そもそも この前まで あなたの方から\n 合方になりたい……って言ってた気が…:
I thought...you wanted to be my partner in the
first place... You'll be my partner won't you?<yesno><close>

100577.「全部 私のカンチガイだったというの？\n ウソよね？ 冗談よね？\n 私の 合:
You think I'm crazy about all of this? Is it a
lie? Are you kidding me? You'll be my
partner... won't you?<yesno><close>

100578.「……ありがとう。あなたになら 安心して\n 背中を あずけることが できるわ。: Thank you. I feel safe leaving my back to you.

100579.「本当はもっと ふたりで 修練を積みたいけど\n 黒怨王の復活は 近いわ。あなた:
I really wish we could train together more,
but the Hell King's return is imminent. I need
you to get ready for that as soon as possible.

100580.「そうね……いったん 獅子門のテントに\n 戻りましょ。くわしい話は その時にさ:
Well... let's go back to the tent at Lion
Gate. We can talk more about it then.

100581.「それじゃ よろしく頼んだわよ。: Well then, I've asked you to take care of it.

103099.「でも…… 一度に ３体も現れるなんて。\n ……モタモタしてる 余裕はないか。:
But... three at once. I guess we don't have
time to waste.

118063.「その悲願を果たすべく 私は かつて\n 合方と共に 復活した黒怨王に挑んだ……:
To fulfill this long-cherished dream, I
challenged the Hell King, who had once
resurrected along with Godo...

118064.「ただ それには どうしても\n 新しい合方が必要だった……。:
But to do that, I really needed a new way of
combining the two...

118065.「ナッチョスには 教えてないけど\n 転職の時の通過儀礼も その後の怨霊退治も\:
I didn't tell Nachos, but the rite of passage when I changed jobs and the subsequent exorcism of the grudge was a ritual to release
the power of the exorcism.
